COMMAND.NAME: getcolors
COMMAND.SUMMARY: Report the colors of a window
COMMAND.PARAMETER: windowName The name of the e93 window this command will act upon.
styleNum The style in the window that the colors will be returned from. The default is 0.
COMMAND.DESCRIPTION: Report the colors for a style in windowName. The format is two sets, representing foreground and background respectively, of three, one for each color channel, hexadecimal byte values RRGGBB RRGGBB.
COMMAND.STATUS:
This command will return an error in the following cases:
windowName is not provided.
windowName is not an e93 window.
